text: luxuries? more like dust collectors - rethink must-haves vs want-to-haves
homemade snacks replace store-bought cravings – sizable penny saver!
you haven’t lived till you’ve scoured thrift shops - vintage gems over fast fashion any day
graphic design doesn’t mean i can’t handle code, yet here we are 😑
always find it amusing when folks are shocked i don't get psyched over new hardware specs—like hey, give me slick design and user experience any day!
